+            _weatherDataView(context),
           ],
         ).marginSymmetric(horizontal: 15),

+  Expanded _weatherDataView(BuildContext context) {
+    return Expanded(
+      child: controller.obx(
+        (data) {
+          final stores = controller.storeData;
+          var s = stores!.weather!.single.icon;
+          return Column(
+            children: [
+              const Spacer(),
+              s!.isEmpty
+                  ? Image.network(
+                      "http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/$s@2x.png",
+                    )
+                  : const SizedBox.shrink(),
+              Stack(
+                clipBehavior: Clip.none,
+                children: [
+                  (stores.main?.temp ?? 0)
+                      .toInt()
+                      .toString()
+                      .text
+                      .headline1(context)
+                      .make(),
+                  Positioned(
+                      right: -25, top: 5, child: "o".text.size(30).bold.make()),
+                ],
+              ),
+              Row(
+                mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
+                children: [
+                  TemperatureMinMax(
+                    name: "min",
+                    temp: (stores.main?.tempMin ?? 0).toInt(),
+                  ),
+                  const SizedBox(
+                    width: 30,
+                  ),
+                  TemperatureMinMax(
+                    name: "max",
+                    temp: (stores.main?.tempMax ?? 0).toInt(),
+                  ),
+                ],
+              ),
+              const SizedBox(
+                height: 10,
+              ),
+              Wrap(
+                children: [
+                  (stores.name.toString() +
+                          ', ' +
+                          stores.sys!.country.toString())
+                      .text
+                      .headline4(context)
+                      .make(),
+                ],
+              ),
+              const Spacer(),
+              WeatherTile(
+                title: "Wind Speed",
+                subtitle: (stores.wind?.speed ?? 0).toString() + "km/h",
+              ),
+              const SizedBox(
+                height: 15,
+              ),
+              WeatherTile(
+                title: "Feels Like",
+                subtitle: (stores.main?.feelsLike ?? 0).toString(),
+              ),
+              ElevatedButton(
+                      key: const Key("ViewDetails"),
+                      style: ButtonStyle(
+                        backgroundColor: MaterialStateProperty.all<Color>(
+                            kSecondaryLightColor),
+                      ),
+                      onPressed: () {
+                        Get.to(() => WeatherDetailScreen(
+                              weatherData: stores,
+                            ));
+                      },
+                      child: "View Details".text.make())
+                  .marginSymmetric(vertical: 15)
+            ],
+          );
+        },
+      ),
+    );
+  }
+
   GestureDetector _locationButton() {
     return GestureDetector(
         onTap: () {
           controller.getLocationWeather();
